color_general_main_text.label: Main text
color_general_main_text.info: Used for the whole website as main text color.

color_general_heading.label: Heading
color_general_heading.info: Color for H1 and H2 hedings.

color_general_catalog_text.label: Catalog text
color_general_catalog_text.info: Used as title color for product on cart page.

color_product_preview_price.label: Preview price
color_product_preview_price.info: Color used for products price in preview mode.

color_product_note.label: Tax note
color_product_note.info: Used as a color for tax notes on cart page.

color_label_bg.label: Background
color_label_bg.info: Used for all the labels such as "sale", "new" etc.

color_label_sale_bg.label: Background
color_label_sale_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sale"

color_label_sold_bg.label: Background
color_label_sold_bg.info: Special color used for labels marked as "sold out / out of stock"

color_icons_social.label: Social
color_icons_social.info: Color used for social icons in shair block.

color_events_link_hover.label: Link hover
color_events_link_hover.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_link_hover_secondary.info: Color used for an active and hovering links, tabs, icons etc.

color_events_border_hover.label: Border hover

type_header_font.label: Lettertype
type_header_font.info: Als je een ander lettertype selecteert, kan dit de snelheid van je winkel beïnvloeden. Meer informatie over systeemlettertypen.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Lettertype

type_header_font_external.label: External font
type_header_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for headings.

type_body_font_external.label: External font
type_body_font_external.info: Selecting this font would disable internal font for body.

settings.paragraph: Prijzen in winkelwagen en bij checkout tonen altijd de valutacodes. Voorbeeld: $1,00 USD.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

badge_names.label: Badge names
badge_names.info: Add here your own badges with the same name as product tag, separated by comma.

show_gallery.info: Hide the all product galleries in modal for the whole store

enable_video_looping.label: Enable video looping
enable_video_looping.info: Enable video looping in modal for the whole store

show_money_with_currency.label: Show money with currency at "Checkout" button

collection.label: Empty drawer promoted collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty.

header__1.content: Aanmelding voor het ontvangen van e-mail

header__2.info: Om je socialemedia-accounts te tonen, koppel je ze in je thema-instellingen.

header__9.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)
